definition: room/work unit/grave/scabbard/family or clan/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy

sentences.english: Need to make your midnite bathroom appointments more exhilarating?
sentences.chinese: 想让你午夜的浴室之约更加愉悦吗？

sentences.english: You crouch on the fire escape, sweating in your dark clothes, staring into this bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 你蹲伏在消防通道上，汗流浃背，观察着浴室。

sentences.english: ALL personnel will enter the facilities ONLY through the west door of the shower rooms.
sentences.chinese: 所有的人员都应该通过淋浴室的侧门进入生产区域的。

sentences.english: All kinds of things go on in these baths.
sentences.chinese: 浴室会发生各种各样事情。

sentences.english: Water was leaking from pipe in the bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 水顺着管子渗到浴室里。

sentences.english: That they have become material them Bathroom cabinet?
sentences.chinese: 怎么它们就成了浴室柜的材料了？

sentences.english: Also, mop your bathroom floor once a week with a bleach-based cleanser.
sentences.chinese: 每周还应用漂白清洁剂擦拭浴室地板。

sentences.english: The bathroom looked dirty and the bedsheets were cheap.
sentences.chinese: 浴室看起来肮脏和床单都很便宜。

sentences.english: Adam's daughter called from the wash-up.
sentences.chinese: 亚当的女儿在浴室叫喊。

sentences.english: Smooth mirror reflective finish on a marble bathroom countertop enhances its looks.
sentences.chinese: 浴室大理石台面的镜面反射可以增强其视觉效果。

sentences.english: They are air-conditioned with a private bath.
sentences.chinese: 房间是空调的，有独用浴室。

sentences.english: When I got back to my apartment, I heard the water running. My wife was in the shower.
sentences.chinese: 到家后，我听见浴室里有水流声，是我老婆在洗澡。

sentences.english: The bathroom eliminates contented physiology requirement outside, still be recreational space changeably .
sentences.chinese: 浴室除满足生理需求外，还可变为休闲空间。

sentences.english: So I grabbed what looked like the sharpest knife and went to the bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 于是我抄起看上去最锋利的一把刀，走向了浴室。

sentences.english: Hastily, she jumped out of bed and ran into the bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 女孩一个鲤鱼打挺跳下床，一溜小跑到浴室。
